Package it.unipv.posfw.orbit.gui

Class FacadeUI

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.posfw.orbit.gui.FacadeUI
public class FacadeUI extends Object
facade class that connects the graphical user interface with the backend logic. implements the singleton pattern.

      public boolean checkReview(int gameId, User user)
      checks if a user is allowed to leave a review for a specific game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game
      user - the user trying to review
      Returns:
      true if the user has not reviewed the game yet, false if they already did
